merpi_desc: %USER's back legs. Long or short they somehow manage to reach all the way to the ground. You could reach them too and...

merpi_normal: %USER is trying to send %TARGET's %T_PART to hell with a scissor squeeze!!
merpi_flowery: %USER is trying to send %TARGET's %T_PART to hell with a scissor squeeze!!

merpi_normal: %USER gently caresses %TARGET's %T_PART with their back legs.
merpi_flowery: %USER gently caresses %TARGET's %T_PART with their back legs.

merpi_normal: %USER lovingly caresses their back legs with %TARGET's %T_PART.
merpi_flowery: %USER lovingly caresses their back legs with %TARGET's %T_PART.

merpi_normal: %USER squishes %TARGET's %T_PART a bit too hard with their back legs!
merpi_flowery: %USER squishes %TARGET's %T_PART a bit too hard with their back legs!
merpi_repeat: %USER squishes %TARGET's %T_PART a bit too hard with their back legs!

merpi_normal: %USER squishes their back legs around %TARGET's %T_PART a bit too hard!
merpi_flowery: %USER squishes their back legs around %TARGET's %T_PART a bit too hard!!
merpi_repeat: %USER squishes their back legs around %TARGET's %T_PART a bit too hard!
